snippet.title: Liberation Circuit: Rogue AI Simulator (release trailer)
snippet.description:
Liberation Circuit is a real-time strategy game with optional programming bits (you can design your own units and either write their AI in a simple programming language or let the autocoder do it for you).

It's free software (GPL v3) and should run on any platform supported by Allegro 5 (Windows, Linux, Mac etc).

On itch.io: https://linleyh.itch.io/liberation-circuit

On github: https://github.com/linleyh/liberation-circuit


Tigsource devlog here: https://forums.tigsource.com/index.php?topic=48505.0
